title: Laptop freezes wit a buz sound n have to force shutdown
body:
Guys !!
Please help me my laptop freezes n makes a buzzing sound while i an in game.Somebody told me that windows 10 anniversary edition could be the reason so i moved back to windows 7 but again this thing happened.Ive tried everything to fix it but cant please help guys

replies.body:
Eeeeeee that definitely doesn't sound good! If your laptop starts freezing and making a strange buzzing sound, it seems to me that this might be stemming from some sort of hardware issue. 

Take some time to go through the steps listed in our [**Bug Splat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974), and let me know if those help!
